article:
Welcome  _  the zoo,everyone!Here is our tour plan. Listen  carefully.First we will  _  the Children's Zoo.After that,we will walk  _  the Bird World.Next is the African Area. _  are elephants and lions!Don't  _  afraid;the cages are safe.
Then,we will have  _  lunch.Everybody brought your lunch,right?Some of you don't have drinks.There are many places  to sell  drinks.
After lunch,we will go to the Asian Area.Last,there is the Butterfly Park.It's across  _  the Snake Park.Then,we will come back here and get on the bus.Remember,don't feed the animals.
OK.Let's  have some fun !
